titleStmt.title: An endeavour to rectifie some prevailing opinions, contrary to the doctrine of the Church of England by the author of The great propitiation, and, A discourse of natural and moral-impotency.
titleStmt.author: Truman, Joseph, 1631-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. M. for Robert Clavel ...,

notesStmt.note: In part, a reply to George Bull's Harmonia apostolica.
Attributed to Joseph Truman. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
